location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The correspondence is filed in chronological order from the front to the back of the file, and terminates in a set of notes at folios 26-28. Circled serial numbers in crayon and ink (red for incoming, blue for outgoing correspondence) refer to entries in the notes.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 29; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file consists of correspondence on financial matters between staff of the British Agency, Doha, Qatar, and the Political Agency, Bahrain, including payment of a bill for manila rope, September 1949, and requests from the British Agency, Doha for the transfer of sums of money to the Agency's accounts with the Eastern Bank Limited, Bahrain, which were passed on to the Bank by the Political Agency, Bahrain.
